title: Room-temperature-storable PCR Mixes for SARS-CoV-2 Detection

abstract:
A novel coronavirus (severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2, SARS-CoV-2)
emerged in late 2019, causing an outbreak of pneumonia [coronavirus disease 2019
(COVID-19)] in Wuhan, China, which then rapidly spread globally. Although the use
